412:1: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣasāda ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchat - “samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ;
412:2: kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ?
412:3: ; kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyaḥ paripūrṇo bhavati?
412:4: ; kiyadrūpeṇa vā bhadanta bhagavan saṃbhāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛḍhapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
412:6: “ sa bhoḥ punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - “sādhu sādhu mahākāruṇika bhadrakaḥ praśnaḥ kalyāṇaṃ te pratibhānaṃ|
412:7: bhūyasyā mātrayā tvaṃ mahākāruṇikāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hitakaro bahukaraścotpanno,
412:8: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tathāgatamidamevaṃrūpaṃ praśnaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase|
412:9: tena hi mahākāruṇika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru ca|
412:10: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ asti mahākāruṇika śūraṃgamo nāma samādhiryatra samādhau sthito bodhisattvaḥ sarvasamādhiṣvanupraviṣṭo bhavati|
412:11: asti ratnamudro nāma samādhiryena sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti|
412:12: asti siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiryatra sthitaḥ sarvasamādhibhirvikrīḍati|
412:16: vilokitamudro nāma samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ murdhānaṃ vyavalokayati|
412:18: niyatadhvajaketau samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati|
412:21: samādhirājasupratiṣṭhitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu rājatvena pratiṣṭhito bhavati|
412:33: sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudre samādhau sarvasamādhayaḥ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti|
412:41: vairocanena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn bhāvayati tapati virocati|
412:43: animiṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo na kadācit samādhidharmā eṣante|
412:44: aniketena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu na kadācid dharmasthitiṃ samanupaśyati|
412:46: niścittena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prahīyante|
412:61: akṣayavatena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ na kṣayaṃ nākṣayaṃ darśayati|
412:65: aniñjitena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu neñjati na vepati na prapañcayati|
412:66: vivardhanena samādhinā sarvasamādhisamāpattiṣu vivardhamānāṃ jñeyaṃ samanupaśyati|
412:69: śuddhapratibhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu catasraḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ pratilabhate|
412:70: kārākāreṇa samādhinā kāravihārakriyāṃ karoti jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati|
412:71: vajropamena samādhinā sarvadharmānnirvedhīkaroti yasya vedhamapi na samanupaśyati|
412:72: cittasthitena samādhinā cittaṃ na calati na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,
412:76: ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate|
412:79: ratiṃ jahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ratiṃ jahāti|
412:103: jñānolkāmatā samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu tena bhāsati tapati virocati|
412:112: vimalaprabhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu saṃskṛtavimalaṃ na samanupaśyati|
412:120: tathāsthitanīścittena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu tathatā na vinivartate|
412:122: vākkalividhvaṃsanagaganapratilabdhena samādhinā bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu vākkarma nopalabhate|
412:125: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhasaṃgraho dharmaparyāyaḥ?
412:168: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahābodhisattvaparṣadaṃ vyavalokya mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayitvāha - “tatra mahākāruṇikā kiyadrūpeṇa vaiśāradyālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntiṃ paripūrayati?
412:169: paramārthadarśino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmoghavyāyāmaparigrahacittaḥ sarvatraidhātuke yo'parigrahacittaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ sa ucyate mahāvaiśāradyaśramaṇadharmo yasyākāśapāṇisamacittaṃ sarvadharmeṣu|
412:172: aṇurapi tatra dharmannopalabhate yadanubudhyeya pratibuddhyeyurvā avipākadharmānadhimucyate;
412:175: muditā ca nirjīvitā copekṣā ca niṣpudgalatā ca,
412:209: asmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ ye daśabhyo digbhyo gṛdhrakūṭe parvate śākyamunestathāgatasyāntike pūrvayogasamādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhadharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇārthamāgatāstairanutpattikebhyo dharmebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhāḥ|
412:210: śākyamunistathāgata āha - “asya khalu punaḥ kulaputra dharmaparyāyasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bhāṣamāṇasyāṣṭacatvāriṃśatīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilābho'bhūt|
412:212: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasya samādhānamukhanirdeśasya saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhadharmaparyāyasya sakalaparipūrṇaṃ viśuddhajñānādhigamo babhūva“||
412:213: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena prāmodyaprasādena viṃśativarṣasadṛśaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃvṛtto,
412:215: sa ca kulaputra rājāmṛtaśuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇāśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairanyaiśca dvānavatibhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ śīlaśrutasamādhisauratyairabhiyogakṛtavān|
412:216: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nupūrveṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrāvakayānakathāṃ paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca;
412:218: tataḥ śatasahasramanuttaramahāyānakathāyāṃ tathā kāyasmṛtyupasthānakathāyāmuddiṣṭavān paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca,
412:230: yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ|
412:231: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ nānāvidhāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā vādyapuṣpacūrṇāmālyagandhavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāratnaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān,
412:233: śarīrapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtavān pañcayojanamuccatvenārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa|
412:236: punarapi tatrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:237: sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ divasānāmatyayena caturaśītibhiḥ prāṇasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāni vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayāgārādanāgarikāṃ pravrajya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavān;
412:239: tatra cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvāṃstribhiryānaiḥ samādāpayāmāsa niveśayāmāsa pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
412:241: upāsakasaṃvare ca śrāmaṇerasaṃvare upasaṃpadāyāṃ bhikṣubhāve brahmacaryavāsasaṃvare niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:242: sa bahūni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi abhijñarddhikauśalye ca niyojayitvā sauratyabrahmacaryavāse niyojayitvā śatrubhūteṣu ca skandhesu parijñāyāṃ niyojayitvā śūnyagrāmāyatanaparijñāyāṃ niyojayitvā pratītyasamutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtajñānaparijñāyāṃ niyojayitvā pratibhāsopamān marīcyupamān dakacandropamān sarvadharmān
412:243: darśayitvānutpādānirodhāpratisaṃdhinirodhaśāntapraśāntopaśāntaparamapraṇītanirodhanirvāṇaparijñānaṃ darśayitvā āryāṣṭāṅge mārge pratiṣṭhāpayitvā kālaṃ kṛtavān|
412:244: evameva ca te sattvāstasya mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto,
412:246: evameva tasmin samaye te sattvā mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto|
412:247: yasmiṃśca divase mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇaḥ kālagatastasmin divase ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya saddharmo'ntarhitastaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyatra lokadhātuṣūpapattiḥ parigṛhītāḥ;
412:249: kecin manusyeṣu kecinnāgeṣu kecidasureṣu kecit praṇidhānena vividhāsu tiryagyoniṣūpapannāḥ||
412:250: kālagataśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇaḥ praṇidhānavaśena dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāmito buddhakṣetrāddaśabuddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃkarṣaṇo nāma lokadhāturaśītivarṣāyuṣkāśca tatra manuṣyā akuśalamūlasamavadhānā raudrā lohitapāṇayaḥ pāpaniviṣṭā adayāpannaḥ sarvasattveṣu amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aparalokabhayādarśinaḥ|
412:251: praṇidhānavaśena mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇastatra saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetre caṇḍālakula upapanno'bhūt|
412:252: sa cātīvadīrghaśarīro'bhūdatīvabalavān atīvavegavān atīvasmṛtimān atīvapratibhānavān atīvajavasamanvāgato'bhūt|
412:253: sa dṛḍhena balavegena sattvān saṃgṛhītvāha - “yadi yūyaṃ bho sattvā adattādānāt prativiramata,
412:255: tadahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ jīvitaṃ prayacchāmi jīvitopakaraṇāni ca dāsyāmi|
412:259: “vayamidānīn tava nāthasya vacanenādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvamadattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ prativiramāmaḥ“|
412:260: sa balacaṇḍālo gatvā rājño vā rājabhaṭṭānāṃ vā nivedayati|
412:261: “jīvitopakaraṇena me prayojanamannena vā pānena vā khādyena vā bhojyena vā peyavastraśayyāgandhahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍarajatajātarūpeṇa vā prabhūtāni jīvitopakaraṇāni dadata mama“|
412:262: sa balacaṇḍālaḥ sattvān yāvajjīvaṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa|
412:264: yaśca tatra rājā sa kālagataḥ tatastai rājāmātyaiḥ sa balacaṇḍālo rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ puṇyabalo nāma saṃskṛtaḥ|
412:265: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇaiva taṃ viṣayamanuśāsitavān,
412:267: yāvad rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇa sarvajambūdvīpe rājā balacakravartī babhūva|
412:268: yadā ca rājñā puṇyabalena sarvajambūdvīpe rājatvaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ tataḥ paścāt sattvāḥ prāṇātipātaviramaṇe samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:270: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:271: atha rājā puṇyabalaḥ sarvajambūdvīpikāṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu saṃniyojya sarvajambūdvīpe ghoṣamanuśrāvayamāsa|
412:272: “ye kecid yācanakā annārthikā yāvad ratnārthikā vā te sarva āgacchantu|
412:274: tato'pareṇa kālasamayena sarvajambūdvīpikāḥ sattvā āgatvā rājānaṃ puṇyabalaṃ yācitavantaḥ;
412:280: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahārāja lokapradīpo jina“ iti|
412:282: pāṃśughoṣa ājīvika āha - “ahaṃ mahārāja vidyādharatvamicchāmi mahāsurasaṃgrāmapramardanakalpaṃ sādhayituṃ|
412:283: tenāhaṃ tava purataḥ sthitvā vijñāpayāmi jīvataḥ puruṣasya carmaṇā prayojanaṃ cakṣuṣā ca prayojanaṃ“|
412:284: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabala evaṃ cintayati|
412:286: gaṇanātikrāntaśca sattvā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā,
412:288: ayaṃ ca me kalyāṇamitro'sārāt kāyāt sāramādadāmi“|
412:289: sa rājāha - “tuṣṭo bhava dadāmi te imaṃ prākṛtamāṃsacakṣustenāhaṃ labheyānuttaraṃ dharmacakṣuḥ|
412:290: dadāmi te imaṃ svakaṃ carma prasannacittena,
412:292: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo dakṣiṇena hastenobhau netrāvutpādyājīvikasya datvā rudhiramrakṣitena mukhenāha|
412:293: “śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā,
412:294: bodhāya mayā dānaṃ nāmitaṃ śubhaṃ prāpsye'haṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ,
412:296: ghorāt saṃsārārṇavāt pāre'nuttare nirvāṇe śive sthāpayeyaṃ“|
412:298: tāvacciraṃ mama jīvitendriyaṃ mā nirudhyeta mā ca me smṛtirnaśyeta mā ca me vipratisāro bhaved,
412:299: yāvacciramasyājīvikasya sā vidyā na siddhā bhavet“|
412:301: sa ca kulaputra pāṃśughoṣājīvikastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā rājño dhriyataḥ kāyaccarmamapanetvā carma gṛhītvā vidyāṃ sādhayitvā,
412:302: tathā saptadivasāni rājñaḥ puṇyabalasya jīvitendriyaṃ na niruddhaṃ,
412:304: na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
412:306: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva,
412:307: na cānyo draṣṭavyo'haṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā|
412:309: prathamacittotpādena ca me gaṇānātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
412:310: ayaṃ me prathamaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca|
412:311: so'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca|
412:312: tadā me caṇḍālavaṃśe sthitvā sattvāṃ kuśale niyojya svabalaparākrameṇa yāvadbalacakravartitvaṃ prāptaṃ,
412:316: yadā ca me svanetrāḥ parityaktāḥ svacarmaparityāgaśca|
412:317: so'haṃ tataścyutastatraiva saṃkarṣaṇe kṣetre dvitīye dvīpe praṇidhānavaśena caṇḍālakula upapannaḥ|
412:318: peyālaṃ, tatra ca mayaivaṃrūpeṇa dṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇa sattvānniyojayitvā kuśaleṣu karmeṣu,
412:322: tatra ca svaśarīrāt jihvā karṇau ca parityaktau,
412:323: yāvat sarvan tatsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ mahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:324: praṇidhānadṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇānuprabandhena praṇidhānavaśena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ,
412:328: ityarthaṃ kulaputrānyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ|
412:329: yadā te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrve'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhicaryāṃ caramāṇā na parāmāpattyā codayanti,
412:332: ityarthaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ paripūrṇābhiprāyāṇāṃ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhavati|
412:339: na ca tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya nāma prajñaptiprādurbhāvo'sti|
412:340: yadā ca mayā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu mahākalpeṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paruṣavacanabhayena sattvāḥ prāṇātipātavairamaṇye samādāpitā yāvattriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:341: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa ma etarhyevaṃ parikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ akuśalaśabdenāpūritaṃ akuśalamūlasamavadhānagataiḥ sattvaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ,
412:343: yathā ca me pūrvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ|
412:344: yādṛśāśca me sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstadṛśenaiva balavīryodyogena bodhicārikāḥ cīrṇāḥ,
412:345: yādṛśaṃ caiva bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratilabdhaṃ|
412:347: saṃkṣiptena te kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
412:348: na kenacit pūrvaṃ bodhisattvenaivaṃrūpaḥ dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
412:349: na ca punaḥ kaścidbodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ya evaṃrūpaṃ dānaparityāgaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ parityajati,
412:350: yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaṃ parityaktaṃ,
412:353: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
412:357: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtavān gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā kalpātikrāntāḥ|
412:359: adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti|
412:360: evaṃ ca vadanti sārakusumito bodhisattvo dṛḍhavīryasamādhāno balavegaparityāgena bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati|
412:361: daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamairmahākalpairatikrāntaiḥ paścāt sa tatrottarāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sahetusaṃkarṣaṇo nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
412:362: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān|
412:363: prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ satpuruṣa ekasya mahākalpasyātyayena paścimāyāṃ diśi bhairavatī nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
412:364: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān|
412:365: ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ kalpairnirdiṣṭitairuparimasyāṃ diśi kṣāravarcanikuñjitāyāṃ lokadhātau pañcakaṣāye tīvrakaluṣasaṃkṣobhaṇe kalpe'sau saṃrocanaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena pañcāśadvarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tatra kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
412:366: acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān|
412:367: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena daśavarṣāni sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati|
412:370: tataḥ paścādasau prahasitabāhurbodhisattvastatra ca kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
412:372: so'pi daśavarṣāṇi sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati|
412:373: tasya ca parinirvṛtasya pūrvapraṇidhānena saptavarṣāṇi saddharmaḥ sthāsyati|
412:374: atra dvau satpuruṣau labdhapūrvavyākaraṇau labdhāsvādāvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prītisaumanasyaprāmodyena saptatālamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe'bhyudgamya prāñjalībhūtau sthitvā bhagavantamekasvareṇa gāthābhiradhyabhāṣatāṃ|
412:397: te catvāro dharaṇidatto vīryasaṃcodanaḥ sārakusumitaḥ prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭaḥ,
412:398: ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu|
412:400: yadāsīttena kālena tena samayenedaṃ buddhakṣetramarajamerujugupsitaṃ nāmābhut,
412:401: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva|
412:403: te'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavantaḥ,
412:404: sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ|
412:411: , yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ,
412:420: ta āhur[“]yadyasmākaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ dadyādevaṃ vayaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayemaḥ“|
412:421: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi|
412:423: āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā|
412:424: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ;
412:427: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ|
412:428: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ|
412:438: “]tato'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot|
412:459: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
412:461: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ|
412:468: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
412:473: ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
412:488: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa|
412:496: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ|
412:497: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
412:500: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:504: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
412:505: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
412:506: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ|
412:507: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ|
412:508: evameva samantaddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svakāyajīvitena sattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ,
412:510: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
412:512: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ,
412:514: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
412:515: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā|
412:516: ye'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
412:517: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ|
412:518: paśya kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet|
412:520: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
412:522: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī|
412:523: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā,
412:527: paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ|
412:531: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
412:532: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
412:538: yaddevasya divasedivase'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate|
412:543: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ|
412:544: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
412:545: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ|
412:546: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ|
412:547: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa cintāmaṇiḥ samāsāditaḥ|
412:548: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
412:549: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
412:550: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ|
412:552: yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti paridevanti,
412:554: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ,
412:559: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot - “yadi mayā ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṣā caturbhirbrāhmairvihārairvanakhaṇḍanivāsināṃ sattvānāmarthāya hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
412:560: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ;
412:561: labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu“|
412:563: te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ :
412:567: sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ;
412:568: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ,
412:570: evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho'bhūvan,
412:571: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
412:573: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ|
412:576: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ|
412:577: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ|
412:578: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
412:582: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ|
412:583: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ|
412:584: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt|
412:592: “yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
412:594: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ|
412:596: tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ“|
412:598: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
412:605: tadanena kulaputra kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ|
412:608: glānapratyayopakaraṇārthaṃ devarṣiyakṣasaṅghāḥ sannipātitāḥ sattvānāmarthāya viḍacarakamūrdhani devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu caivaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
412:610: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ|
412:611: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
412:616: anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ|
412:617: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:618: apyanuttareṇa jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
412:621: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ|
412:622: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
412:624: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt|
412:626: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva|
412:627: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:629: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
412:630: tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ yāvaccendranīlamahānīlajyotīrasadakaprasādakāni yācanakānāṃ tāvatprabhūtāni ratnāni labhyante|
412:636: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ“|
412:638: “yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ|
412:640: yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ|
412:641: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ|
412:642: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
412:644: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ ca,
412:646: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ“,
412:648: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ|
412:650: ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ“|
412:651: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,
412:654: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati“|
412:661: atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati“|
412:662: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
412:664: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,
412:668: yo'yaṃ mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
412:673: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau,
412:674: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,
412:677: tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
412:678: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
412:681: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
412:682: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
412:691: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
412:692: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
412:694: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:700: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ|
412:707: na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
412:709: ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu|
412:710: yāvacca me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu,
412:711: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa|
412:712: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā;
412:713: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:714: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva|
412:715: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi|
412:719: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
412:723: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca|
412:728: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān|
412:729: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ|
412:730: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
412:731: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
412:735: yathātra pūrve na ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
412:737: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
412:739: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva|
412:740: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro'bhūvan savirocano nāma|
412:742: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ|
412:743: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti|
412:751: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
412:753: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi“|
412:754: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ|
412:757: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ|
412:760: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā|
412:761: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
412:764: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
412:766: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu|
412:767: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:768: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
412:769: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ|
412:771: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
412:773: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:775: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakayāne samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ|
412:778: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
412:782: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
412:784: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ || 5 ||
